name: analyze_coverage
description: Analyze coverage statistics including breakdown by tactic and list of gaps

name: batch_coverage_check
description: Check coverage against multiple threat groups in one call. Returns compact stats for each group.

name: find_group_gaps
description: Find techniques used by a threat group that you do NOT have coverage for

name: generate_coverage_layer
description: Generate a Navigator layer showing covered vs uncovered techniques (green=covered, red=gap)

name: generate_gap_layer
description: Generate a gap analysis layer comparing your coverage against a target set of techniques

name: generate_group_layer
description: Generate a Navigator layer highlighting all techniques used by a threat group

name: generate_layer
description: Generate an ATT&CK Navigator layer from a list of technique IDs with optional scores

name: get_all_technique_ids
description: Get a list of all valid technique IDs in the framework

name: get_common_groups
description: Get top 20 threat groups by technique count. Useful for quick selection without searching.

name: get_data_sources
description: Get data sources that can detect a specific technique

name: get_group
description: Get a threat group by ID (e.g., G0016 for APT29)

name: get_group_techniques
description: Get all technique IDs used by a specific threat group

name: get_mitigations
description: Get mitigations for a specific technique

name: get_software
description: Get malware or tool by ID (e.g., S0154 for Cobalt Strike)

name: get_stats
description: Get ATT&CK framework statistics (version, counts by type, etc.)

name: get_tactic
description: Get a MITRE ATT&CK tactic by ID or shortname

name: get_technique
description: Get a MITRE ATT&CK technique by ID (e.g., T1059.001)

name: get_technique_ids_by_platform
description: Get ONLY technique IDs for a platform (lightweight - no full objects). Use this instead of list_techniques_by_platform when you just need IDs.

name: get_technique_ids_by_tactic
description: Get ONLY technique IDs for a tactic (lightweight - no full objects). Use this instead of list_techniques_by_tactic when you just need IDs.

name: list_groups
description: List all threat groups

name: list_tactics
description: List all ATT&CK tactics in matrix order

name: list_techniques
description: List all ATT&CK techniques with pagination

name: list_techniques_by_platform
description: List techniques for a specific platform

name: list_techniques_by_tactic
description: List all techniques for a specific tactic (e.g., execution, persistence)

name: quick_coverage_check
description: Quick coverage check against a threat group. Returns minimal stats (~200 bytes) instead of full gap analysis. Perfect for fast comparisons.

name: rebuild_index
description: Force re-download and re-index the ATT&CK framework data

name: search_groups
description: Search threat groups by name, alias, or description

name: search_software
description: Search malware and tools by name or description

name: search_techniques
description: Search ATT&CK techniques by name, description, or detection guidance
